casebody.data:
Carol WALENSKI
v.
CONNECTICUT STATE EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT COMMISSION et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 28, 2018

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 185 Conn.App. 457 , 197 A.3d 443 (2018), is denied.

ROBINSON, C. J., and D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
